Name: El Tindero
Ingredients: 10 ml Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar to 1 water)
Instructions: POUR beer into chilled glass and set aside. SHAKE other ingredients with ice and fine strain into beer charged glass. Finally add ice to glass.
Review: Strangely reminiscent of a 'lager shandy' with very subdued coconut notes. It's a very tasty lager shandy, though.
History: Philippine Bacardí Legacy 2016 winning cocktail by Ohn Richelieu Cruz, Café Enye, Quezon City.
Nutrition: One serving of El Tindero contains 160 calories
